name: Spotter (denmanrooke)
description:
It's your first day on the job, and your task is to keep the well oiled & bronzed machines running smoothly. When they start to wear out, give 'em a spot.

When you start, your lifters will begin their training. You'll see them begin to sweat after a little while, then when they freak out, make sure to spot 'em. Lose 3 lifters and it's game over.
